name: Candy Bullet
description:
Smash as many candies as you can with Candy Bullet!
Help Mr. Cannon to smash all the candies that will appear on your screen with 10 bullets. Improve your game with fantastic power-ups. Collect all the coins that will appear. Smash more candies than your friends!


Features:
————————————

- Tap the cannon to shoot a bullet
- Smashed candies will release bullets to smash other candies
- Tap the coins released by explosions to collect them
- Buy power-ups in the shop with the coins you collect
- Beat your friends’ scores!

Are you ready for the challenge?
